shut_door.description: Close the opened refrigerator door by pushing it to the closed position.

clean_opened_door.description: Clean the opened refrigerator door by wiping it down to remove any dirt or stains.

shut_fridge_door.description: Shut the refrigerator door that is currently open, by pushing it gently until it closes.

clean_inside_door.description: Clean the inner side of the opened refrigerator door by carrying out a wipe action to get rid of residues.

clean_the_door_and_body.description: Clean both the inner side of the refrigerator door and the refrigerator body by using a wipe action.

open_door.description: Open the closed refrigerator door by pulling it to the open position.

close_door.description: The door is already closed, no need to perform any action.

clean_closed_door.description: Clean the closed refrigerator door by wiping it down to remove any dirt or stains.

open_fridge_door.description: Open the closed refrigerator door by pulling it gently until it opens.

door_already_closed.description: The refrigerator door is already closed. There is no need to perform any action.

clean_outside_door.description: Clean the outer side of the refrigerator door by using a wipe action.

clean_refrigerator_body.description: Clean the refrigerator body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_refrigerator.description: Clean the entire refrigerator including the body and door.

wiping_fridge_body.description: Safely clean the refrigerator by wiping the body to get rid of accumulated dust and other particles.

wipe_fridge_body_and_door.description: Clean the body of the refrigerator and the exterior of the door by applying a wipe action to get rid of dust and residues.
